details.title: Starting XI
details.content:
These are the 11 men for India who’ll be starting the match against @oranjehockey in the Quarter Final match of the Odisha Hockey Men’s World Cup Bhubaneswar 2018. #INDvNED #IndiaKaGame #HWC2018 #DilHockey pic.twitter.com/GDpwzUpvec

— Hockey India (@TheHockeyIndia) December 13, 2018

details.title: H-2-H at the World Cup
details.content:
India have never beaten the Netherlands at World Cup.

(Played- 6, India-0, The Netherlands-5, Draw-1)

Not just teams, it’s a battle between individuals as well. Who’d be the last man standing and making more saves, the experienced campaigner, @16Sreejesh or the promising, @PirminBlaak? Find out tonight when India face @oranjehockey!#INDvNED #IndiaKaGame #HWC2018 #DilHockey pic.twitter.com/xcx74P0YsG

— Hockey India (@TheHockeyIndia) December 13, 2018

details.title: Match begins
details.content: The match is underway with the Netherlands keeping the possesion early.

details.title: India into the attack
details.content: India have started to attack with Akashdeep trying to enter the Netherlands circle.

details.title: WATCH| News & Views: TNIE Newsroom analysis on today's encounter.
Penalty corner for India
details.content: India win a penalty corner after the ball hits the Dutch defender inside the circle.

details.title: Goal!
details.content: India are 1-0 up against the Netherlands.

details.title: Akashdeep scores!
details.content:
12' GOAL!!!!! @akashdeeps985 feeds off the rebound with his signature tomahawk shot and fires India into the lead!!!

IND 1-0 NED#INDvNED #IndiaKaGame #HWC2018 #DilHockey pic.twitter.com/cPfxqEw5px

— Hockey India (@TheHockeyIndia) December 13, 2018

details.title: Oranje equalise
details.content: The Dutch score with 3 seconds to go in the first quarter.

details.title: End of first quarter
details.content: India 1-1 The Netherlands

details.title: Numbers
details.content:
Possession:

India- 45%, The Netherlands- 55%

Circle Penetrations:

India- 6, The Netherlands- 5

Shots- 

India- 2, the Netherlands-2

details.title: Second quarter begins
details.content: The Dutch are into the attack as they penetrate the Indian circle in the first minute of the quarter.

details.title: Saved
details.content: An Indian attack saved by the Dutch keeper at the goal-mouth.

24' WHAT A CHANCE! @manpreetpawar07 lines up a ball for @akashdeeps985 who gets a shot in that is saved by @PirminBlaak, who stays strong on his line to ward off the rebound shot by Nilakanta.

IND 1-1 NED#INDvNED #IndiaKaGame #HWC2018 #DilHockey

— Hockey India (@TheHockeyIndia) December 13, 2018

details.title: Akashdeep fails
details.content: Akashdeep tries the tomahawk cross but fails.

details.title: End of second quarter
details.content: End of first half with the score tied at 1-1. It was a goal-less quarter.

details.title: Star player!
details.content:
.@akashdeeps985's 7th Goal at the World Cups and his 2nd at the Odisha Hockey Men's World Cup Bhubaneswar 2018.#IndiaKaGame #HWC2018 #DilHockey pic.twitter.com/c5Qnx9doa1

— Hockey India (@TheHockeyIndia) December 13, 2018

details.title: Numbers
details.content:
Possession:

India- 50%, The Netherlands- 50%

Circle penetrations: 

India- 10, The Netherlands- 7

Shots:

India- 3, The Netherlands- 2

details.title: Penalty Corner for the Dutch
details.content: The Netherlands win a PC and fail to convert it.

details.title: Chance missed
details.content: Akashdeep strikes it over the goal-post.

details.title: Another PC for the Oranje
details.content: The Dutch win another pealty corner.

details.title: PC on repeat
details.content: Another penalty corner for the Netherlands as the ball hits Indian defender.

details.title: India 1-1 The Netherlands
details.content:
HT. Nothing to separate both the teams as @TBrinkman95 equalizes for @oranjehockey minutes after the lead earlier taken by India from a goal by @akashdeeps985.#INDvNED #IndiaKaGame #HWC2018 #DilHockey pic.twitter.com/2b64ge46Di

— Hockey India (@TheHockeyIndia) December 13, 2018

details.title: Counter-attack
details.content: After the Netherlands keep the posession in the first five minutes of Q3, India win the ball to counter attack.

details.title: India down to 10 players
details.content: Hardik Singh has to sit out after recieving the green card.

details.title: To face: Australia
details.content: The winner of this match will face Australia in the semifinals.

details.title: End of Q3
details.content: India 1-1 The Netherlands. Another goalless quarter.

details.title: Q4 starts
details.content:
Q4 Begins!

IND 1-1 NED#INDvNED #IndiaKaGame #HWC2018 #DilHockey

— Hockey India (@TheHockeyIndia) December 13, 2018

details.title: Goal denied
details.content: The Netherlands celebrate prematurely as the goal is denied after India refer successfully.

The two most powerful warriors are patience and time.

- Leo Tolstoy pic.twitter.com/MiRq2IlrIg

— Rahul Gandhi (@RahulGandhi) December 13, 2018
Rahul's tweet indicate Kamal Nath to be next CM.

details.title: PC wasted
details.content: The Netherlands waste a penalty corner.

details.title: GOAL!
details.content: The Netherlands are in the lead after they convert a PC after missing the previous one.

details.title: Drag-Flick
details.content:
50' GOAL! @oranjehockey have pulled ahead thanks to @MinkvdWeerden's set-piece attempt.

IND 1-2 NED#INDvNED #IndiaKaGame #HWC2018 #DilHockey

— Hockey India (@TheHockeyIndia) December 13, 2018

details.title: Yellow Card
details.content: Amit Rohidas gets a yellow card.

details.title: Into the Dutch circle
details.content: Harmanpreet's long ball in into the Dutch circle.

details.title: Chance!
details.content: India have a chance to equalise as they win a PC.

details.title: Saved!
details.content: The Dutch keeper saves a reverse strike after the ball rebounded from the PC.

details.title: PC for the Netherlands
details.content: India defend the penalty corner without a goalkeeper.

details.title: India are out of the tournament
details.content: The Netherlands will now face Australia in the semi-finals as they win the match 2-1

FT. India ends their run at the OHMWC Bhubaneswar 2018 with an unfortunate loss against @oranjehockey as the team played their hearts out, but fell short against a determined Dutch side on 13th December.#INDvNED #IndiaKaGame #HWC2018 #DilHockey pic.twitter.com/4YZCmBCXYy

— Hockey India (@TheHockeyIndia) December 13, 2018
